Package.Name: Statistics Panels
Package.Description: This option shows you panels for an overview of the current vehicle´s stats, your account stats, and session stats on the parameters panel (right side of screen in garage).

Package.Name: vehicle parameters
Package.Description: Will show the tank stats, account stats, and session stats on the Vehicles Panel.

Package.Name: "Research Watchdog"
Package.Description: Will show the tank stats, account stats, and session stats on the Vehicles Panel.

Package.Name: Colored In-Game Messages -> !! sets client language to english !!
Package.InternalNotes:
take from Core (5,5MB), not Vanilla

disable Session_Statistics_YK_Module_ColoredMessages 
- this WILL break EVERY micropatch
- & WG is releasing a lot of them
Package.Description: NOTE: this mod sets client language to english
